column4: hi. i installed a package from source with a patch, but when i want to apt-get upgrade, it wants to get the one i dont want, how do i get around this?
There should be an option in the Synaptic Package manager to ignore package updates for the application that you don't want the system to update
Question: Did you have the package installed prior to installing from source?
i did, then purged it before installing the new one
